scenario_text.value:
We have NO IDEA what’s waiting ahead of us!
You must remain VIGILANT at ALL TIMES!
Enough with this crap.

What?! You got a problem with what I’m
saying?!
Did I stutter?

(This is bad! Shuuji and Minoru are ready to
go at it! I’ve got to stop them!)
(How can I stop them from fighting?)
Get them to cool down.
Raise my own voice.
Point out that there’s fault on both sides.

Come on, Shuuji, cooler heads have to prevail
here.
I, I am cool...

Everyone’s anxious here, so our leader should
show them how to stay calm and optimistic.
Yeah...
Hey, calm down, Shuuji.
But I AM calm!

This is no time for dissent in the ranks, am
I right?
Well... Yeah, that’s true...
Minoru, you should watch what you say.
How am I in the wrong here?!

And you, Shuuji, try not to get so heated.
You’re our leader, after all.
Yeah...
The blood went to my head back there.

Still, we’re going into unknown territory up
ahead.
We have to stick together. Got it?!

He just says whatever he wants to, and never
apologizes for anything...
Aw come on, we gotta keep our cool here...
(That applies to Shuuji more than anyone...)
